p: Chemical composition of Euphorbia EOs is largely studied: e.g., E. acanthothamnos, E. apios, E. characias, E. dendroides, E. helioscopia, and E. rigida with nonanal, germacrene, phytol, β-caryophyllene, heneicosane, and heptacosane as major components [ 26], E. teheranica with elemol as major component [ 27], E. caracasana and E. cotinifolia with β-caryophyllene as a major component [ 28], and E. heterophylla with 1,8-cineole as major component [ 29].
